summary: "24" is an American TV show about a counter-terrorist agent, Jack Bauer, played by Kiefer Sutherland. Each season is like a long movie, showing 24 hours in Jack's life. The series has lots of action, with Jack stopping terrorists and dealing with political drama. It started in 2001 and had nine seasons, with the last episode in 2014. The show won many awards but was also criticized for how it showed certain groups and methods. There was even a spin-off series called "24: Legacy."
title: 24 (TV series)
